about.title: About Me
about.description: Senior Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience building complex applications across startups and enterprises. Expert in React/Next.js ecosystems, AI integration, real-time systems, and cloud infrastructure. Currently developing WhatsApp Business platforms, Chrome extensions, and scalable web applications. Specialized in solving technical challenges and building products that scale.

personal.tagline: Engineering Scalable Solutions for Modern Challenges
personal.shortDescription: Building enterprise-grade applications with AI integration, real-time features, and cloud-native architecture. Transforming complex requirements into elegant, scalable solutions.

skills.label: Complex Web Applications
skills.description: Building enterprise-grade React/Next.js applications with advanced state management, real-time features, and scalable architectures

skills.description: Implementing OpenAI APIs, vector search, WhatsApp Business APIs, and multi-platform social media integrations

skills.description: Deploying with AWS, Terraform, Docker containerization, and managing production systems with PostgreSQL and Redis

skills.description: Developing feature-rich browser extensions with complex UI components and seamless browser API integrations

skills.label: Real-time Systems
skills.description: Building WebSocket-based applications, live messaging platforms, and notification systems with Socket.io

skills.label: Payment & Enterprise Solutions
skills.description: Integrating Stripe/PayPal payments, SSO authentication, and building multi-tenant SaaS platforms

keyAchievements: Built complex multi-tenant WhatsApp Business platform with AI integration and real-time messaging capabilities
Developed enterprise Chrome extension with advanced UI components and browser API integrations
Implemented cloud infrastructure using AWS, Terraform, and containerized deployments
Created scalable social media management platform with payment processing and SSO authentication
Built vector search systems with OpenAI integration for intelligent content processing
Deployed production systems handling real-time notifications and multi-platform integrations

testimonials.testimonial:
Raj transformed our vision into a stunning reality for Kairos Club.
His expertise and dedication shone through, delivering a website that brilliantly captures our essence. The seamless blend of design and functionality showcases his talent.
We wholeheartedly recommend him for his exceptional work and commitment to excellence. Thank you for elevating our online presence.
